for_sales.sales_text:
Much admired and very well equipped Norske 35 ferrocement gaff cutter professionally built in 1978 by Windboats of Wroxham. GRP balsa core deck which is lightweight, virtually maintenance free and waterproof. Windboats have a great reputation for build quality and we have met a number of other Norske 35's over the years including one that has circumnavigated plus Norske also built the Endurance range which went on to be built in Fibreglass. Fully refitted in 1998 with new Noble hollow mast, rigging, seacocks and much more over the years. Sleeps four in two cabins plus a couple of pipe cots.

We are the second owners but having owned her for 27 seasons we are with our advancing years regretfully passing her on. She has cruised from Scotland to LaRochelle over the years and has taken part in a number of Brest and Paimpol festivals along with cruising and racing with the Old Gaffers Association, attending more Yarmouth Old Gaffers and other events than we remember! We have a healthy supply of trophies.

Recent insurance survey from 2023.

Topsides repainted for 2024 season.

Yanmar 3JH4E 39hp engine fitted in 2007, approx. 1800 hours.

  • SKB Mainsail 2023 SKB
  • No 2 Jib 2023
  • No 1 Jib 2016, UV strip replaced 2023
  • Staysail by Saunders 2016
  • Topsail. 1998
  • Raymarine ST 4000 autopilot
  • NASA log, depth and repeater
  • Garmin 128 GPS
  • Yeoman chart plotter
  • NASA AIS
  • VHF radio
  • Dolphin mains battery charger
  • 240 volt outlets
  • Adverk smart charger on alternator
  • 2 x 115amp house batteries 2022
  • 1 x 100 amp starter battery
  • Solar panels on both battery banks
  • Taylor’s 030 Large paraffin stove with oven.
  • Solid fuel heater
  • Pressurised hot and cold water
  • Isotherm 20 litre water heater running off the engine with 240 volt immersion heater.
  • New rudder bearings fitted 2023
  • Self tailing winches in the cockpit for the jib and staysail
  • Winch on the boom for reefing.
  • Lavac toilet
  • Shower.
  • 50 metres 3/8 inch chain
  • 2 x 35lb CQR anchors
  • Simpson Lawrence seatiger 2 speed manual windlass
  • Sprayhood
  • Full Cockpit enclosure
  • Mainsail cover with zips replaced 2023
  • Staysail cover
  • Isotherm fridge
  • S/S diesel tank. Aprox 50 litres
  • Flexible Water tank Aprox 200 litres. Plus space for 60 litres of cans in the bilges.
  • Huge Lazarette for inflateable dinghy plus much more
  • Two large cockpit lockers.
  • SSR registered
  • VAT documentation.
  • Many pictures on Apollo Duck

boat.full_description: Owned by us since 1997 Passager has cruised from Scotland to La Rochelle and taken part in many Brest, Paimpol and Yarmouth festivals.
boat.name: Passager
boat.short_description: 35 foot Ferrocement Gaff Cutter designed by John Perryman and built by Windboats of Wroxham in 1978
